verses.verse: הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Behold the LORD בּוֹקֵ֥ק <S%H1238><s%> empty הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> maketh the earth וּבֽוֹלְקָ֑הּ <S%H1110><s%> and maketh it waste וְעִוָּ֣ה <S%H5753><s%> and turneth פָנֶ֔יהָ <S%H6440><s%> it upside down וְהֵפִ֖יץ <S%H6327><s%> and scattereth abroad יֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And it shall be as with the people כַּכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> so with the priest כַּעֶ֙בֶד֙ <S%H5650><s%> as with the servant כַּֽאדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> so with his master כַּשִּׁפְחָ֖ה <S%H8198><s%> as with the maid כַּגְּבִרְתָּ֑הּ <S%H1404><s%> so with her mistress כַּקּוֹנֶה֙ <S%H7069><s%> as with the buyer כַּמּוֹכֵ֔ר <S%H4376><s%> so with the seller כַּמַּלְוֶה֙ <S%H3867><s%> as with the lender כַּלֹּוֶ֔ה <S%H3867><s%> so with the borrower כַּנֹּשֶׁ֕ה <S%H5383><s%> as with the taker of usury כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> so נֹשֶׁ֥א <S%H5378><s%> with the giver of usury בֽוֹ׃

הִבּ֧וֹק ׀ <S%H1238><s%> shall be utterly תִּבּ֛וֹק <S%H1238><s%> emptied הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The land וְהִבּ֣וֹז ׀ <S%H962><s%> and utterly תִּבּ֑וֹז <S%H962><s%> spoiled כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

אָבְלָ֤ה <S%H56><s%> mourneth נָֽבְלָה֙ <S%H5034><s%> [and] fadeth away הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth אֻמְלְלָ֥ה <S%H535><s%> languisheth נָבְלָ֖ה <S%H5034><s%> [and] fadeth away תֵּבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> the world אֻמְלָ֖לוּ <S%H535><s%> do languish מְר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> the haughty עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth חָנְפָ֖ה <S%H2610><s%> also is defiled תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> under the inhabitants כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> thereof because they have transgressed תוֹרֹת֙ <S%H8451><s%> the laws חָ֣לְפוּ <S%H2498><s%> changed חֹ֔ק <S%H2706><s%> the ordinance הֵפֵ֖רוּ <S%H6565><s%> broken בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> the everlasting

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָלָה֙ <S%H423><s%> Therefore hath the curse אָ֣כְלָה <S%H398><s%> devoured אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וַֽיֶּאְשְׁמ֖וּ <S%H816><s%> therein are desolate יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and they that dwell בָ֑הּ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that חָרוּ֙ <S%H2787><s%> are burned יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> therefore the inhabitants אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְנִשְׁאַ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> left אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> men מִזְעָֽר׃ <S%H4213><s%> and few

אָבַ֥ל <S%H56><s%> mourneth תִּיר֖וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> The new wine אֻמְלְלָה־ <S%H535><s%> languisheth גָ֑פֶן <S%H1612><s%> the vine נֶאֶנְח֖וּ <S%H584><s%> do sigh כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שִׂמְחֵי־ <S%H8056><s%> glad לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> care for

שָׁבַת֙ <S%H7673><s%> ceaseth מְשׂ֣וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> The mirth תֻּפִּ֔ים <S%H8596><s%> of tabrets חָדַ֖ל <S%H2308><s%> endeth שְׁא֣וֹן <S%H7588><s%> the noise עַלִּיזִ֑ים <S%H5947><s%> of them that rejoice שָׁבַ֖ת <S%H7673><s%> ceaseth מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> the joy כִּנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> of the harp

בַּשִּׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> with a song לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁתּוּ־ <S%H8354><s%> They shall not drink יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine יֵמַ֥ר <S%H4843><s%> shall be bitter שֵׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> strong drink לְשֹׁתָֽיו׃ <S%H8354><s%> to them that drink

נִשְׁבְּרָ֖ה <S%H7665><s%> is broken down קִרְיַת־ <S%H7151><s%> The city תֹּ֑הוּ <S%H8414><s%> of confusion סֻגַּ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> is shut up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every בַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> every house מִבּֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> that no man may come in

צְוָחָ֥ה <S%H6682><s%> [There is] a crying עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַיַּ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> for wine בַּֽחוּצ֑וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in the streets עָֽרְבָה֙ <S%H6150><s%> is darkened כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> all joy גָּלָ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> is gone מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> the mirth הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

נִשְׁאַ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> is left בָּעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> In the city שַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8047><s%> desolation וּשְׁאִיָּ֖ה <S%H7591><s%> with destruction יֻכַּת־ <S%H3807><s%> is smitten שָֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> and the gate

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus יִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> will be in בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> When thus it shall be in the midst הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> the people כְּנֹ֣קֶף <S%H5363><s%> [there shall be] as the shaking זַ֔יִת <S%H2132><s%> of an olive tree כְּעוֹלֵלֹ֖ת <S%H5955><s%> [and] as the gleaning grapes אִם־ <S%H518><s%> when כָּלָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> is done בָצִֽיר׃ <S%H1210><s%> when the vintage

הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יִשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> They shall lift up קוֹלָ֖ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice יָרֹ֑נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> they shall sing בִּגְא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> for the majesty יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God צָהֲל֖וּ <S%H6670><s%> they shall cry aloud מִיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> from the sea

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> in בָּאֻרִ֖ים <S%H217><s%> in the fires כַּבְּד֣וּ <S%H3513><s%> Wherefore glorify יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD בְּאִיֵּ֣י <S%H339><s%> in the isles הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> [even] the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

מִכְּנַ֨ף <S%H3671><s%> From the uttermost part הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth זְמִרֹ֤ת <S%H2158><s%> songs שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> have we heard צְבִ֣י <S%H6643><s%> [even] glory לַצַּדִּ֔יק <S%H6662><s%> to the righteous וָאֹמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> But I said רָזִי־ <S%H7334><s%> My leanness לִ֥י רָֽזִי־ <S%H7334><s%> my leanness לִ֖י א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> woe לִ֑י בֹּגְדִ֣ים <S%H898><s%> unto me the treacherous dealers בָּגָ֔דוּ <S%H898><s%> have dealt treacherously וּבֶ֥גֶד <S%H899><s%> have dealt very בּוֹגְדִ֖ים <S%H898><s%> yea the treacherous dealers בָּגָֽדוּ׃ <S%H898><s%> treacherously

פַּ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> Fear וָפַ֖חַת <S%H6354><s%> and the pit וָפָ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> and the snare עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> Confront יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> [are] upon thee O inhabitant הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> become הַנָּ֞ס <S%H5127><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] he who fleeth מִקּ֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> from the noise הַפַּ֙חַד֙ <S%H6343><s%> of the fear יִפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַפַּ֔חַת <S%H6354><s%> into the pit וְהָֽעוֹלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> and he that cometh up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out of the midst הַפַּ֔חַת <S%H6354><s%> of the pit יִלָּכֵ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> shall be taken בַּפָּ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> in the snare כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֲרֻבּ֤וֹת <S%H699><s%> for the windows מִמָּרוֹם֙ <S%H4791><s%> from on high נִפְתָּ֔חוּ <S%H6605><s%> are open וַֽיִּרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> do shake מ֥וֹסְדֵי <S%H4146><s%> and the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

רֹ֥עָה <S%H7489><s%> is utterly הִֽתְרֹעֲעָ֖ה <S%H7489><s%> broken down הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth פּ֤וֹר <S%H6565><s%> is clean הִֽתְפּוֹרְרָה֙ <S%H6565><s%> dissolved אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth מ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> is moved הִֽתְמוֹטְטָ֖ה <S%H4131><s%> exceedingly אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

נ֣וֹעַ <S%H5128><s%> shall reel תָּנ֤וּעַ <S%H5128><s%> to and fro אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> The earth כַּשִּׁכּ֔וֹר <S%H7910><s%> like a drunkard וְהִֽתְנוֹדְדָ֖ה <S%H5110><s%> and shall be removed כַּמְּלוּנָ֑ה <S%H4412><s%> like a cottage וְכָבַ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> thereof shall be heavy עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּשְׁעָ֔הּ <S%H6588><s%> and the transgression וְנָפְלָ֖ה <S%H5307><s%> upon it and it shall fall וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> never תֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> again קֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> and not rise ס

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִפְקֹ֧ד <S%H6485><s%> shall punish יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> the host הַמָּר֖וֹם <S%H4791><s%> of the high ones בַּמָּר֑וֹם <S%H4791><s%> [that are] on high וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> and the kings הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> upon the earth

וְאֻסְּפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> And they shall be gathered together אֲסֵפָ֤ה <S%H626><s%> are gathered אַסִּיר֙ <S%H616><s%> [as] prisoners עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in בּ֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> in the pit וְסֻגְּר֖וּ <S%H5462><s%> and shall be shut up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in מַסְגֵּ֑ר <S%H4525><s%> in the prison וּמֵרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> and after many יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days יִפָּקֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6485><s%> shall they be visited

וְחָֽפְרָה֙ <S%H2659><s%> shall be confounded הַלְּבָנָ֔ה <S%H3842><s%> Then the moon וּבוֹשָׁ֖ה <S%H954><s%> ashamed הַֽחַמָּ֑ה <S%H2535><s%> and the sun כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָלַ֞ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּהַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> Zion וּבִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem וְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> will be before זְקֵנָ֖יו <S%H2205><s%> and before his ancients כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> gloriously פ
